headline: The Dealmaker in the Center of the Manosphere
summary: When  Mark Shapiro  is sitting, one of his legs is usually shaking up and down.  In the past two weeks, Shapiro orchestrated a $7.7 billion deal to bring the UFC mixed-martial arts fights and their crowds of young male fans to Skydance’s Paramount, betting millions more will see the fights.  “He’s just a bat out of hell at all times and he doesn’t stop,” said ESPN star Stephen A. Smith of Shapiro.
